Articles.Content: Nothing too fancy, just a reskin of the RT-10 Solid Fuel Booster, based on Lawn Dart's BOOST can fanart. Drop it in place of the stock texture for fizzy goodness!
Check back in the other thread, I posted a cleaned up version for you without the nutritional labels and bar codes.

I like this. A lot.

It's even more fun when you tweak the BOOST booster to be crazy overpowered. ;D
